short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open ChatGPT AI in a standalone window using Alt+C or via a button click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT AI is a powerful AI tool available as a Chrome Extension. It conveniently offers quick access to OpenAI's ChatGPT's advanced capabilities directly from your web browser. You can have real-time conversations, get answers from any site you're browsing, and enjoy longer chat sessions. It's consistently updated to function optimally, ensuring a seamless, interactive chatbot experience.
